title: One-Dish Chicken and Stuffing Bake Recipe
description: This chicken and stuffing bake uses seasoned stuffing and chicken breasts baked in an herby, creamy mushroom sauce for an easy, one-dish casserole.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Dinner One-Dish Chicken and Stuffing Bake 4.4 (77) 58 Reviews 10 Photos This chicken and stuffing bake is an easy version of Grandma's specialty. This one-dish casserole features seasoned stuffing and chicken breasts baked in a creamy mushroom sauce. Submitted by Campbell's Kitchen Updated on June 26, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 10 10 10 10 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 6 Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 ¼ cups boiling water 4 tablespoons butter or margarine 4 cups Pepperidge Farm® Herb Seasoned Stuffing 6 skinless, boneless chicken breasts ½ teaspoon paprika, or to taste 1 (10.5 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup ⅓ cup milk 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley Directions Gather all ingredients and preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir together boiling water and butter in a medium bowl until butter is melted. Add stuffing; mix gently until combined. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spoon stuffing along the center of a 3-quart shallow baking dish. Arrange chicken around stuffing and sprinkle with paprika. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Mix together condensed soup, milk, and parsley in a small bowl; pour over chicken. Cover the dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 164 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of One-Dish Chicken and Stuffing Bake 01 of 10 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 10 Photo by  Khlamm01 04/14/2020 03 of 10 Photo by  Ross Jeseritz 03/08/2020 04 of 10 Photo by  Bradley Falls 02/05/2020 This is a fabulous recipe my brother and myself faught at the end of the dish because it was so good. I'm making 6 this time because it was so good. My brother hates mushrooms, but what he don't see.....lol. Making this tonight. 05 of 10 Photo by  Bradley Falls 02/05/2020 This is a fabulous recipe my brother and myself faught at the end of the dish because it was so good. I'm making 6 this time because it was so good. My brother hates mushrooms, but what he don't see.....lol. Making this tonight. 06 of 10 Photo by  Bradley Falls 02/05/2020 This is a fabulous recipe my brother and myself faught at the end of the dish because it was so good. I'm making 6 this time because it was so good. My brother hates mushrooms, but what he don't see.....lol. Making this tonight. 07 of 10 Photo by  Diana Bennett 02/02/2019 Yum. I like veggies. So On top of the stuffing, I put sauted onions, bell peppers and celery then put the chicken all over the stuffing and then covered it with that golden mushroom soup. 08 of 10 Photo by  Hillery Higginbotham 01/15/2019 09 of 10 Photo by  NurseCarol1974 04/21/2017 Although I added extra pepper, poultry seasoning and garlic powder to the chicken, this recipe came out very bland. I read other reviews and I baked the chicken at 350 degrees for an hour. Not sure I'd make this one again. 10 of 10 Photo by  Trusted Brands 03/12/2013 1 You’ll Also Love Cheesy Chicken Florentine Casserole 2 Ratings Quick Bruschetta Chicken Bake 735 Ratings One Dish Chicken and Rice Bake 250 Ratings Hearty Chicken and Noodle Casserole 131 Ratings Poppy Seed Chicken Casserole 313 Ratings Quick and Easy Chicken and Stuffing Casserole 64 Ratings Chicken Divan Lasagna 19 Ratings Campbell's Kitchen Chicken Broccoli Divan 184 Ratings Three-Cheese Chicken Penne Pasta Bake 57 Ratings Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake 29 Ratings Slow Cooker Chicken with Stuffing 136 Ratings Aunt Jewel's Chicken Dressing Casserole 377 Ratings Swiss Chicken Casserole I 579 Ratings Swiss Chicken Casserole 1,404 Ratings Quick Chicken and Stuffing Casserole 54 Ratings Lemon Mushroom Herb Chicken 405 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
